message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a little more than that. Would you consider $9,250?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $9,100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
